yaw.description: Angle of rotation around the normal axis. Usually the z axis. This angle is applied first.

pitch.description: Angle of rotation around the transverse (also called lateral) axis. Usually the y axis. This angle is applied second (after yaw).

roll.description: Angle of rotation around the longitudinal axis. Usually the x axis. This angle is applied last (after yaw and pitch).

NauticAngles.title: Nautic Angles
NauticAngles.description: Nautic angles describe a rotation of an object in 3d.  See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aircraft_principal_axes
